text: Hildburghausen is a German town in the south of Thuringia. The next towns in size are Suhl and Coburg. Its population is ca. 13,000. Its mayor is Steffen Harzer. ==Sister cities== * Pelhřimovin * Würselen (Germany) ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Verwaltungsgemeinschaftfrei towns in Hildburghausen
title: Hildburghausen
